General.Name: Gold Mountain Mining Corp
General.Description: Gold Mountain Mining Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold and silver properties in Canada. The company owns 100% interest in the Elk Gold project that consists of 32 mineral claims covering 22,152 hectares and two mining leases covering 646 hectares located in South Central British Columbia, Canada. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1285 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4B1

1.Name: Mr. Braydon David Hobbs B.A., C.A., CPA
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
